name: Gnosis Vault Assistant
description: Gnosis Vault Assistant is a powerful, secure, and automated dashboard for managing Safe (formerly Gnosis Safe) multisig wallets. It gives teams and DAOs real-time portfolio tracking, streamlined transaction signing, and cross-chain asset management â€” all in one interface.
